name: Perfect Sock Self Striping "The Fae Queene" #4
description:
She is the monarch of the faeries. Her name is not Morgan or Mab and she is all beauty and loveliness as befitting a queen. 

Four stripes of Rose, Fading Gold, Green.

460 yd Skein, 100 grams,
7-8 stitches = 1 inch on US 0-2 (2-2.75mm)

Yarn: 75% Superwash Wool, 25% Nylon sock yarn. This yarn is soft, yet durable and has more spring than a kangaroo. Machine washable. Hand wash for extra long lasting knits.

Every monitor is different but colors are as accurate as possible.

name: Perfect Sock Self Striping "Unicorn Apocalypse" #4
description:
A pony prances into view and she is beyond perfect. It seems like sunshine and rainbows are beaming from her gilded horn!! No... Wait...

Unicorn Apocalypse is a self striping wonder of Purple Pony, Rainbow Fire Fight and Apocalyptic Storm Clouds. 

Perfect sock is soft, yet durable and has more spring than a kangaroo. Machine washable. Hand wash for extra long lasting knits.
75% Superwash Merino, 25% Nylon
Huge ~460 yd Skein, 100 grams,
7-8 stitches = 1 inch on US 0-2 (2-2.75mm)

Every monitor is different but colors are as accurate as possible.

Silver Gray & Sunshine Yellow.

name: Notable Gnome Vegan Lip Balm
description:
You can never have too many lip balms, and at this price you can try all of our delicious varieties!
This is a nice, firm lip balm with great staying power.  Plus, no animal products!  

Available in seven tasty flavors:

Blackberry Pomegranate - Fresh and tasty
Buttercream Icing - Exactly what it sounds like, creamy, sweet, and calorie-free!
Chocolate Bacon?! - Why not?
Honey Honey - a top seller: just a hint of sweetness
Juicy Peach - just like the real thing!
Orange Dream- creamy and amazingly fresh 
Peppermint - classic and refreshing

Ingredients: Castor Seed Oil, Palm Kernel Oil, Avocado Oil, Coconut Oil, Aloe Leaf Extract, Carnauba Wax, Candelilla Wax, Flavor Oil

Net wt. 0.15 oz.

name: Notable Gnome Mini Lotion Bar
description:
Now even better with Vitamin E!

The same formulation as our full-size lotion bar, in a smaller size.  This mini size is perfect for your tiniest purse, or if you're just trying out a new fragrance.
Made from a special blend of beeswax, cocoa and mango butters, and oils (sweet almond, coconut, and hemp), plus vitamin E and fragrance or essential oil, these bars offer lasting, non-greasy moisture in a delightfully scented, easy to use bar.   Just pop it out of the tin, rub between your hands, and smooth into skin, or simply rub the bar over whatever area needs hydration.

Net wt. 0.5 oz.

Unscented: Just the moisture-rich goodness, with no scent added

Almond Cake: the nutty warmth of almond, tempered by the sweet softness of butter and sugar

Butt Naked (special edition tin): A youthful blend of melons, strawberries, pears and fresh green apples--think "tropical drink on the beach"

Eastern Amber: Citrus and bergamot top notes, followed by sandalwood, patchouli, and white musk combine with jasmine, rose, and amber in this sensual scent

Fig: A citrusy floral with a musky background  *a customer favorite*

Jasmine: An exotic, sensual floral  *a customer favorite*

Lavender: Classic relaxation *a customer favorite*

Monkey Farts (special edition tin): A fun fragrance, great for kids!  Vanilla base notes, with kiwi, strawberries and bubble gum, with top notes of juicy grapefruit and fresh bananas

Tahitian Vanilla: A bit fruity and floral, this is not your average vanilla!

Varsity (for men): A great casual fragrance for men.   This may remind you of Tommy by Tommy Hilfiger.


Notable Gnome product Ingredients:

Cocoa Butter is a fat extracted from the cocoa bean.  Its velvety texture and emollient properties make it a popular ingredient in soaps, lotions, and lip balms.  It contains Vitamin E, making it great for softening dry, chapped skin. In its raw form it has a delicious chocolate aroma; however, for our lotion bars, we use a deodorized form so that it doesn’t interfere with the fragrances we add.
 
Mango Butter is derived from the kernels of the mango tree.  It’s similar to cocoa butter, but it’s a little less oily feeling, and absorbs into the skin very easily.  Mango butter contains Vitamin A, B, and C, as well as the antioxidants quercertin and caffeic acid.  We’ve added just a tad of mango butter to our formula to keep it light and fast-absorbing.
 
Beeswax has a multitude of uses: candles, shoe polish, producing batik fabric, and dozens of others.  It’s a staple in many skincare products due to its ability to seal in moisture.  It also keeps our lotion bars nice and firm but not hard.
 
Fractionated Coconut Oil is a coconut oil from which some of the fatty acids have been removed, leaving behind just a very light but effective moisturizer that absorbs easily into the skin.
 
Hemp Oil is considered a dry oil, so it feels less greasy than other oils.  It contains oleic acid and linoleic acid, which are both well-absorbed by the skin and are believed to have anti-inflammatory properties.  These acids, as well as gamma linoleic acid, also help the skin retain moisture.
 
Sweet Almond Oil is light yet very emollient.  Like hemp oil, sweet almond oil offers anti-inflammatory and anti-itch benefits, yet it also has vitamin E, an anti-oxidant and powerful moisturizer.  SAO is a popular ingredient in cosmetic and toiletry products, and makes a great massage oil.

name: Notable Gnome Cuticle Cream
description:
We’ve formulated this cuticle moisturizer with argan oil, lanolin,  and vitamin E to offer rich lasting moisture, and packaged it in a slim stick tube to offer the ultimate in convenience.   Lemon and orange essential oils add just a touch of scent.  To use, simply sweep across cuticles and massage in.
Ingredients: Beeswax, Cocoa Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Argan Oil, Virgin Coconut Oil, Vitamin E, Lanolin, and Orange and Lemon Essential Oils

Net weight 0.07 oz

name: Soak 90 mL/ 3 oz
description:
Aquae is a “purely elemental” scent that’s like a breath of fresh sea air, this crisp, refreshing scent will make you think of white cotton sheets snapping in the salty breeze. 

Celebration is sweet, delicate and absolutely delicious, this perennial favorite smells like good, clean, fun.

Lacey is a material girl, soft and sweet. Pretty, gentle and totally sweet, Lacey is perfect for luxe fabrics and fabulous frills. This modern scent combines spring blossoms with sweet bergamot creating a light yet alluring fragrance. 

Scentless, for your sensitive side.

Perfect for knitters, quilters and fashion lovers alike, the gentle, no-rinse formulation makes keeps your clothes and crafts soft and looking their best. Laundry day has never smelled better!

description:

Celebration is sweet, delicate and absolutely delicious, this perennial favorite smells like good, clean, fun.

Lacey is a material girl, soft and sweet. Pretty, gentle and totally sweet, Lacey is perfect for luxe fabrics and fabulous frills. This modern scent combines spring blossoms with sweet bergamot creating a light yet alluring fragrance.

Perfect for knitters, quilters and fashion lovers alike, the gentle, no-rinse formulation makes keeps your clothes and crafts soft and looking their best. Laundry day has never smelled better!

name: Rainbow Sherbet Stitches
description:
Rainbow Sherbet Stitches!

The orange/raspberry color makes me think of my favorite flavors in a pint of rainbow sherbet! This set 

of 5 stitch markers features one oval shaped marker and four circle markers. Our non-snag ring fits up to 

a size 8(5.0mm) knitting needle.

name: Ritz Sock Self Striping "You Had Me @ Rainbow" #6
description:
Rainbow; 'nuff said! Red Light, Fresh Squeezed Orange, Sunny Yellow, Lush Green, Deep Seas Blue & Unicorn Bad Ass Purple. 

Go on put a little razzle dazzle on your feet with this springy and soft sock yarn.

436 yards/100gr skein
7-8 stitches = 1 inch on US 0-2 (2-2.75mm)

Yarn: 75% superwash Merino, 20% nylon, 5% Stellina
Just like the Perfect Sock, this yarn is soft, durable and has more spring than a kangaroo. And it Sparkles more than Liberaces' and his chandeliers!  Machine washable. Hand wash for extra long lasting knits.

Every monitor is different but colors are as accurate as possible.

name: Halele'a Pre Order
description:
Pre Orders will be open from November 8th - 20th at this special price. 

Price shown is for TWO skeins of Helluva and a copy of the pattern Halele'a by MelSki. You will also receive an exclusive code for an extended behind the scenes video and tutorials for Halele'a! A KAL for this beautiful cardigan will begin December 26th in the Must Stash Podcast group on Ravelry and we hope you will be able to join us. All orders will be shipped by December 10th. 

Helluva is a 6 ply fingering weight yarn of 100% Superwash Merino which comes in generous 150 grams skeins of 750 yards each.  

Six colors to choose from:

Ka Pau [kah poo ah] is the blossom. Garnet with gray and black undertones, this color is  rich and vibrant without coming across as bold or garish.

Lana [lah nah] is calm as still waters. Blue bordering on indigo with a burnish of black like the blue waters of the ocean at night. 

Malana [mah law nah] is calming and soothing. This grayish blue skein has tones of amethyst and teal in places. It is a complex skein that knits up into a harmonious tonal color. 

Pauo'le [pow oh lay] is never ending. The gray in this skein has undertones of pink/mauve with slight overtones of blue and brown. I love the complex yet neutral natural of this skein. 

Pomaika'i [poh' mai kah' ee] is lucky! Emerald green is toned down slightly by a dark glaze and knits up with beautiful depth of greens. 

Pualani [poo ah law nee] is Heaven's flower. Mel's yellow is what this skein should be called as she specially requested this color. It is a zesty yellow with cream and butter tones to soften but it is still a show stopper! 


ALL PRE ORDERS WILL MAIL ON DECEMBER 10TH BARRING ANY NATURAL OR SUPERNATURAL DISASTER. 

<font size="3" color="aqua">**After the pre orders close on November 20th, the skein will return to their full price of $40 each.**</font>

<font size="5" color="yellow">EVERY skein is hand made and therefore unique. Please try to think of them as siblings rather than twins!</font>
